name: Initiate's War Club
description: In Natlan, trees tend not to be named for their appearance, but according to the ways in which their wood is normally used.\nWood from lush canopied low-growing trees is among the most versatile in Natlan, used for everything from small wooden components to frames for pieces of furniture. Many warriors, when first learning the art of combat, use branches from these trees as substitutes for training clubs.
